conversations.body_text: Hi chris r,    I apologize for any inconvenience caused. I see that both of your packages have been delivered. Have you received them?  https://www.fedex.com/fedextrack/?trknbr=886911126138&trkqual=12029~886911126138~FDEG  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047152933408
